H0.text: Electrical energy is the form of energy that lightning represents, as energy appears in many forms.

H1.text: Mechanical energy is the form of energy that lightning represents.

H2.text: Magnetic energy is the form of energy that lightning represents, as energy appears in many forms.

H3.text: Sound energy is the form of energy that lightning is categorized as.

A4.text: Lightning is a natural phenomenon consisting of electrostatic discharges occurring through the atmosphere between two electrically charged regions.

A5.text: The charge carrier in lightning is mainly electrons in a plasma.
